thread.title: Canadian Education Council Signs MoU With Obafemi Awolowo University On Professional Academic Cooperation

title: Canadian Education Council Signs MoU With Obafemi Awolowo University On Professional Academic Cooperation
text:
The Canadian Education Council (CEC) has officially signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Obafemi Awolowo University (OAU) to promote professional academic cooperation and establish the Canadian Education Council International Career Centre on the universityâ€™s campus. This landmark partnership is set to transform the career readiness of OAU students and graduates by providing direct pathways [ ]
